item.description:
Hello everyone . .

Trivia night is held at Lennys every monday night and pretty much takes up the front half of the restaurant and bar area.

Each Team (2-5 people) kicks in $10 as an entry fee and the winner takes home the kitty.
(10 teams = $100) if team were to win, members can decide on use/split of proceeds.

No limit on number of attendees as we can create several teams if need be, however we need you to be there to by 7pm please . . .

Drink specials and plenty of food available to order off menu during Trivia as well . .

Hope to see you there . . laughing as usual . .

Glennn
cell 203-314-5604

group.name: The New Haven Area Dining Out Group

item.name: TRIVIA night at LENNY's in Branford
